data.name: RichEditControlVerticalRulerVisibility
data.value: For internal use only. To specify whether the vertical ruler is displayed, use the RulerOptions.Visibility property.

data.name: RichEditControlVerticalRuler
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: RichEditControlUseDeferredDataBindingNotifications
data.value: Enables you to fire data binding events immediately for several text properties, resolving issues with multiple RichEdit controls bound to the same data source.

data.name: RichEditControlSurface
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: RichEditControlShowHoverMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether the hover menu can be shown. This is a dependency property.

data.name: RichEditControlShowCaretInReadOnly
data.value: Gets or sets whether the caret is displayed if the control is read-only.

data.name: RichEditControlShowBorder
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display the border of the RichEditControl. This is a dependency property.

data.name: RichEditControlSelectionRTF
data.value: Gets the formatted text of the selected range.

data.name: RichEditControlSelection
data.value: Gets the plain text of the selected range.

data.name: RichEditControlSectionsCount
data.value: Gets the number of sections in the document.

data.name: RichEditControlSectionCount
data.value: Gets the number of sections in a document.

data.name: RichEditControlSearchPanel
data.value: Provides access to a Search Panel of the RichEditControl.

data.name: RichEditControlRibbon
data.value: Gets or sets the Ribbon control containing command controls for use with the current RichEditControl.

data.name: RichEditControlParagraphsCount
data.value: Gets the number of paragraphs in the document.

data.name: RichEditControlParagraphCount
data.value: Gets the number of paragraphs in a document.

data.name: RichEditControlOptions
data.value: Provides access to various options of the RichEditControl.

data.name: RichEditControlKeyCodeConverter
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: RichEditControlIsCaretVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the caret is displayed.

data.name: RichEditControlHoverMenuCalculator
data.value: Identifies the dependency property.

data.name: RichEditControlHorizontalScrollBarVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets whether the horizontal scroll bar is displayed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: RichEditControlHorizontalScrollBar
data.value: Provides access to a horizontal scroll bar of the RichEditControl.

data.name: RichEditControlHorizontalRulerVisibility
data.value: For internal use only. To specify whether the horizontal ruler is displayed, use the RulerOptions.Visibility property.

data.name: RichEditControlHorizontalRuler
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: RichEditControlHasToolTip
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: RichEditControlHandleWindowClose
data.value: Gets or sets whether RichEditControl should be disposed of when a window is closed.

data.name: RichEditControlFocusElement
data.value: Gets the element with logical focus.

data.name: RichEditControlDocumentLoader
data.value: Gets or sets the object that provides the IRichEditDocumentLoader interface and can be used to load a document.

data.name: RichEditControlCornerBoxVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets whether the corner box element is displayed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: RichEditControlContent
data.value: Gets or sets the control's content.

data.name: RichEditControlCharsCount
data.value: Gets the number of characters in the document.

data.name: RichEditControlCharCount
data.value: Gets the number of characters in a document.

data.name: RichEditControlBarManager
data.value: Gets or sets the main component that provides Bars functionality. This is a dependency property.

data.name: RichEditHoverMenuBeginGroup
data.value: Hides the corresponding property of the base class.

data.name: RichEditControlWordsCount
data.value: Gets the number of words in the current document.

data.name: RichEditControlWordCount
data.value: Gets the number of words in a document.

data.name: RichEditControlViewBounds
data.value: Gets the bounds of the RichEditControl client region.

data.name: RichEditControlVerticalScrollBarVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets whether the vertical ruler is displayed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: RichEditControlVerticalScrollBar
data.value: Provides access to a horizontal scroll bar of the RichEditControl.

data.name: RichEditHoverMenuId
data.value: Hides the corresponding property of the base class.

data.name: RichEditHoverMenuItemsCount
data.value: Gets the number of menu item links in the current menu.
